title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to add breakpoints or marks in the java editor ruler in Photon, the popup menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Expected: This should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc.

Actual: The menu does not appear.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Expected: A menu should pop up with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.

Actual: No menu is displayed.
